items.title: UBS Upgraded Caterpillar Inc. (CAT) as Trade Outlook Brightens
items.description: Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) received a rating upgrade by UBS on 16th May 2025, from “Sell” to “Neutral”, at a price target of $357, previously $340. The bank highlighted a more contained downside scenario for the stock after recent progress in U.S.-China trade talks, though analysts warned the company is “not out of the macro woods.” UBS […]

items.title: Caterpillar: Golden Opportunity To Sell (Technical Analysis)
